alert.note: Alert for Southern Gila Highlands, Black Range (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 22 at 2:12AM MST until February 23 at 5:00AM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 12 inches above 7000 feet. Up to 16 inches on highest peaks. Snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches above 5000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 80 mph. * WHERE...Southern Gila Highlands/Black Range in northern Grant County. * WHEN...Now until 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing snow will cause drifting on roadways and near white-out conditions at times.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
